docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
Here's a list of all the chat commands you can use on my Twitch stream. Click on any !commands to copy them to your clipboard.

I use Streamer.bot, StreamElements, Ko-fi Stream Alerts, LurkBait, and a chatbot account to manage my chat commands.

StreamElements commands can also be found on my StreamElements profile page.

docs.title: Interaction
docs.text: Name Command(s) Description Restrictions Bot Reply Bot Bonk !bonk <targetUser> Lets you give a virtual bonk to another user. <targetUser> is given a Bonk on the head by <user> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Hug !hug <targetUser> Lets you give a virtual hug to another user. <user> gives <targetUser> a great big hugg Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Lurk !lurk Shares that you're lurking in the stream. Thanks for being here! Enjoy your Lurk <user> <3 Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Poke !poke <targetUser> Lets you give a virtual poke to another user. <targetUser> has been poked by <user> Such violence... Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Say Hi !hi, !arrive, !checkin, !cookie Shares that you're saying hi and provides you with a complimentary cookie (1/stream). Thanks for saying hiii <user> Here's your complementary cookie GivePLZ 🍪 Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Tuck !tuck <targetUser>, !tuckin <targetUser> Lets you virtually tuck-in another user. <user> tucks <targetUser> into bed tuckk Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Unlurk !unlurk Shares that you are in the stream, but no longer lurking. Welcome back <user> <3 Streamer.bot (@auragolem)

docs.title: Just for Fun
docs.text: Name Command(s) Description Restrictions Bot Reply Bot Fish !fish LurkBait Minigame 120s (2m) LurkBait (@GroundAura) Flip Coin !flipcoin Flips a coin and tells you the result. <user> flipped a coin...and it landed on...<result> Streamer.bot (@auragolem)

docs.title: Quotes
docs.text: Name Command(s) Description Restrictions Bot Reply Bot Get Quote (By Id) !quote <id>, !quote get <id>, !quoteget <id>, !getquote <id> Attempts to get a quote from the quote list with the given Id. WIP 5s Quote #<id>: " <quote> " - <user> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Get Quote (Latest) !quote latest, !quote get latest, !quoteget latest, !getquote latest Gets the latest added quote from the quote list. WIP 5s Quote #<id>: " <quote> " - <user> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Get Quote (By Term) !quote <term>, !quote search <term>, !quotesearch <term>, !searchquote <term> Attempts to get a quote from the quote list that includes the given search term. WIP 5s Quote #<id>: " <quote> " - <user> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Get Quote (Random) !quote, !quote random, !quoterandom, !randquote Gets a random quote from the quote list. WIP 5s Quote #<id>: " <quote> " - <user> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Add Quote !quote add <user> <quote>, !quoteadd <user> <quote>, !addquote <user> <quote> Adds a quote to the quote list. WIP Mods, VIPs 5s Added Quote #<id>: " <quote> " - <user> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Edit Quote !quote edit <id> <quote>, !quoteedit <id> <quote>, !editquote <id> <quote> Lets you edit a quote in the quote list. Allows you to fix formatting of the quote text. You can type latest instead of a specific id to get the latest quote. WIP Mods 5s Quote #<id> Updated: " <quote> " - <user> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Hide Quote !quote hide <id>, !quotehide <id>, !hidequote <id> Flags a quote from the quote list to be hidden, so it no longer appears when getting quotes. A soft delete for moderation purposes. You can type latest instead of a specific id to get the latest quote. WIP Mods 5s Quote #<id> hidden. Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Delete Quote !quote delete <id>, !quotedelete <id>, !delquote <id> Permanently removes a quote from the quote list. You can type latest instead of a specific id to get the latest quote. WIP Admins 5s Quote #<id> removed. Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Quote List !quotes, !quotelist Posts a link to a list of the streamer's quotes. WIP Public quote list is still WIP Streamer.bot (@auragolem)

docs.title: Socials
docs.text: Name Command(s) Description Restrictions Bot Reply Bot Link All Socials !socials, !links, !linktree Posts a link to the streamer's Linktr.ee page. Here are my linkies! :D https://linktr.ee/groundaura Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link Bluesky !bluesky, !bsky Posts a link to the streamer's Bluesky account. Follow me on Bluesky! https://bsky.app/profile/groundaura.bsky.social Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link Discord !discord, !server Posts a link to the streamer's Discord server. Unused Join the Discord! (we have cookies) <link> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link GitHub !github, !gh Posts a link to the streamer's GitHub account. Check out my work on GitHub! https://github.com/GroundAura Streamer.bot (@auragolem) KofiStreamBot Link !kofi, !ko-fi Posts a link to the streamer's Ko-fi page. Ko-fi link is: https://ko-fi.com/groundaura?ref=Twitch Ko-fi Stream Alerts (@KofiStreamBot) Link Ko-fi !donate, !tip Posts a link to the streamer's Ko-fi page. Support me on Ko-fi! https://ko-fi.com/groundaura Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link Nexus !nexus, !nexusmods Posts a link to the streamer's Nexus Mods account. Check out my work on Nexus! https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/GroundAura Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link Patreon !patreon Posts a link to the streamer's Patreon page. Unused Support me on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/c/groundaura Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link Twitch !twitch, !ttv Posts a link to the streamer's Twitch account. Follow me on Twitch! https://www.twitch.tv/groundaura (you're already here silly) Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link Twitter !twitter, !x Posts a link to the streamer's Twitter/X account. Follow me on Twitter! https://x.com/GroundAura Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Link YouTube !youtube, !yt Posts a link to the streamer's YouTube account. Subscribe on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/@groundaura Streamer.bot (@auragolem)

docs.title: Stream Info
docs.text: Name Command(s) Description Restrictions Bot Reply Bot (disabled) About Me !aboutme, !about, !aura, !streamer Shares some info about the streamer. WIP Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Commands !commands, !cmds Posts a link to a list of all stream commands. All commands: https://groundaura.github.io/streaming/commands Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Commands (Stream Elements) !secmds, !secommands, !streamelementscmds Posts a link to StreamElements commands. You can find a list of all Commands here https://StreamElements.com/groundaura/commands StreamElements (@StreamElements) Extensions !extensions Shares some info about browser extensions to use with Twitch. If you're on PC, you can use some of Aura's recommended browser extensions to improve your viewing experience.You can view additional emotes using 7TV (https://7tv.app).You can view others' pronouns and set your own using Twitch Chat Pronouns (https://pr.alejo.io).You can customize and enhance your Twitch experience further using 7TV, FrankerFaceZ (https://www.frankerfacez.com), and Previews (https://previews-app.com) extensions. Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Fishing Dex !fishdex LurkBait Minigame 600s (10m) LurkBait (@GroundAura) Fishing Help !fishhelp LurkBait Minigame LurkBait (@GroundAura) Fishing Leaderboard !fishboard LurkBait Minigame 300s (5m) LurkBait (@GroundAura) Modlist !modlist, !mods Posts a link to what mods the streamer is using in the current game. WIP Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Streamer Pronouns !pronouns Tells you the streamer's pronouns. Aura uses he/him pronouns. Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Time !time, !auratime Tells you what time it is for the streamer. The time for GroundAura is <time> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Up Time !uptime Tells you how long stream has being live for. groundaura has been streaming for <time> StreamElements (@StreamElements)

docs.title: Viewer Info
docs.text: Name Command(s) Description Restrictions Bot Reply Bot Account Age !accountage, !accage, !created Tells you how long ago your account (or a target user's) was created. <user|targetUser> was born <time> ago Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Cookie Count !cookies, !cookiejar Tells you how many times you (or a target user) have said !hi and received their complementary cookie. <user|targetUser> has <count> Cookies in their jar! Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Fishing Stats !fishstats LurkBait Minigame LurkBait (@GroundAura) Follow Age !followage, !howlong Tells you how long you (or a target user) have been following. <user|targetUser> has been following for <time> Streamer.bot (@auragolem) Watch Time !watchtime, !viewtime Tells you how much time you (or a target user) has spent watching stream. <user|targetUser> has spent <time> watching groundaura StreamElements (@StreamElements)

docs.title: Moderation
docs.text: Name Command(s) Description Restrictions Bot Reply Bot Fish (for User) !fish <targetUser>, !fish <targetUser> x<amount> LurkBait Minigame Mods LurkBait (@GroundAura) LurkBait Boost Rare Fish !fishboost, !fishboost on, !fishboost off LurkBait Minigame Admins LurkBait (@GroundAura) LurkBait Delete User !deletefisher <targetUser> LurkBait Minigame Admins LurkBait (@GroundAura) LurkBait Mute !mute, !mute on, !mute off LurkBait Minigame Admins LurkBait (@GroundAura) LurkBait Reconnect !reconnect LurkBait Minigame Mods LurkBait (@GroundAura) LurkBait Reset Leaderboard !resetleaderboard LurkBait Minigame Admins LurkBait (@GroundAura) LurkBait Switch Leaderboard !switchleaderboard, !switchleaderboard alltime, !switchleaderboard current LurkBait Minigame Admins LurkBait (@GroundAura) Streamer.bot Test !streamerbot Tests whether Streamer.bot is connected and working. Mods, VIPs Streamer.bot is connected! Streamer.bot (@auragolem)
